starvationevasion.sim

Class Region

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.sim.Territory
      • starvationevasion.sim.Region

  • public class Region
extends Territory
    Region class extends AbstractAgriculturalUnit, includes methods for accessing its fields.

      • aggregateTerritoryData

        public void aggregateTerritoryData(int year)
        Each region is composed of 1 or more territories. This method sets this regions data by aggregating all the region's data. For some data items, such as population, the aggregate is the sum. For other data items the aggregate is weighted average.
